RuntimeModule.Name: IdrinthsImprovedBehemothRebalance
RuntimeModule.Title: Idrinth's Improved Behemoth Rebalance
RuntimeModule.Description:
- fixes the bug of not being able to start with a behemoth - behemoths are slightly harder to kill - behemoths behave more like normal ships - behemoths starters have a permanent (small) benefit - behemoths produce influence directly for the empire
Load this aftrt Improved Traits.
This mod is still hightly WIP!
Source Code is at https://github.com/Idrinth-s-Endless-Space-2-Mods/IdrinthsImpovedBehemothRebalance - contributions are always highly welcome.
RuntimeModule.Author: Idrinth
